attributes.additional_details: Have a review of this alot of people are suffering all ready and now this hike in gas and electricity prices
attributes.background: We are struggling to pay these prices so I started a petition

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about energy prices, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586

If you want the Government to do something different to the above petition you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
